String.string: Destroy {@creature:46#7004#aquaas extractors} in the {@Rgn:46010$$Raga Evala Spire} of {@Rgn:46001$$the Three Towers} and collect evolved plant samples.
Deliver the evolved plant samples to {@creature:246#1036$$Jesspan}.
Go to {@Creature:246#1103$$Lensa} at {@Rgn:46014$$Three Towers Research Base} on the {@Rgn:46018$$Three Towers Upper Level}.
